job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkeling van AI-modellen: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes. Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of designing, developing, and implementing predictive models and algorithms, which is the core of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Experimenten en Proof-of-Concepts: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
job_tasks.justification: Developing experiments and Proof-of-Concepts to demonstrate technical feasibility and compare models falls under the broader scope of model development and validation.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing models into a functional state, even if not explicitly building a full application, requires software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with other departments to integrate AI solutions implies understanding business processes and aligning technical solutions with them.

job_tasks.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with diverse departments.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses sharing findings and recommendations with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, which is a form of communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: The instruction to stay up-to-date with the latest trends directly implies a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, implementation, and comparison of predictive models and algorithms, including tasks like computer vision, regression, classification, and NLP. While there's a mention of NLP, the core focus is on traditional machine learning tasks and model experimentation rather than generative AI specific applications or LLMs.
